name: ShellShock Live
summary: Demolish your friends with hundreds of upgradable weapons shot from your customizable tank in this action-packed online multiplayer tanks game. Earn XP to level up and unlock new tanks, weapons, and gear. Fight against or alongside your friends for strategic team or free-for-all matches.
info:
• 别名: 弹震在线
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: Artillery
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2020年5月22日
  • 官方网站: https://www.shellshocklive.com/
  • 开发: kChamp Games
  • 发行: kChamp Games
